# running_targets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `running_targets` is to provide a base to make a [`targets` pipeline](https://books.ropensci.org/targets).


## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "targets", "tarchetypes"))
```
